birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省台南县官田乡西庄村
birth_place.en: Xizhuang Village, Guantian Township, Tainan County, Taiwan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国律师、政治人物，曾任中华民国第10、11任总统，实现首次政党轮替。卸任后因涉及多起贪污及洗钱弊案被判刑，后获准保外就医。
description.en: A Taiwanese lawyer and politician who served as the 10th and 11th President of the Republic of China from 2000 to 2008, achieving the first party alternation in power. After leaving office, he was convicted in several corruption and money laundering cases and was later granted medical parole.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁的妻子，在陈水扁的政治生涯中扮演重要角色。因车祸导致下半身瘫痪，后亦因多起弊案被判刑。
description.en: Wife of Chen Shui-bian, who played a significant role in his political career. She became paralyzed from the waist down after a car accident and was later convicted in multiple corruption cases.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁与吴淑珍的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Chen Shui-bian and Wu Shu-chen.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁与吴淑珍的儿子。
description.en: The son of Chen Shui-bian and Wu Shu-chen.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁的父亲。
description.en: The father of Chen Shui-bian.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁的母亲。
description.en: The mother of Chen Shui-bian.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一所综合性研究型公立大学。陈水扁于此获得法学士学位。
description.en: A comprehensive public research university in Taiwan. Chen Shui-bian obtained his Bachelor of Laws degree from here.

description.zh-cn: 台湾主要政党之一，于1986年成立。陈水扁为其创始党员，并曾多次担任党主席，代表该党当选中华民国总统。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan, founded in 1986. Chen Shui-bian was a founding member, served as its chairman multiple times, and was elected President of the Republic of China as its candidate.

description.zh-cn: 台湾主要政党之一。陈水扁早年曾加入，后退出。国民党在2000年总统大选中败于陈水扁，结束其在台湾长达55年的执政。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan. Chen Shui-bian was a member in his early years before leaving. The KMT was defeated by Chen in the 2000 presidential election, ending its 55-year rule in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾于1979年发生的一场重大警民冲突事件，事件后的大审判中，陈水扁担任辩护律师团成员，成为其投身政坛的契机。
description.en: A major confrontation between police and civilians in Taiwan in 1979. In the subsequent trials, Chen Shui-bian served as a member of the defense counsel, which marked his entry into politics.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市的最高行政首长。陈水扁于1994年至1998年担任第一届民选市长。
description.en: The chief executive of Taipei City, Republic of China. Chen Shui-bian served as the first directly elected mayor from 1994 to 1998.

en: President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国家元首。陈水扁于2000年至2008年担任第10、11任总统。
description.en: The head of state of the Republic of China. Chen Shui-bian served as the 10th and 11th president from 2000 to 2008.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。陈水扁的前任总统，曾被舆论视为暗示陈水扁为其接班人。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as President of the Republic of China. He was Chen Shui-bian's predecessor, and public opinion once suggested he hinted at Chen as his successor.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。于1998年台北市长选举击败寻求连任的陈水扁，并于2008年接替陈水扁成为总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as President of the Republic of China. He defeated the incumbent Chen Shui-bian in the 1998 Taipei mayoral election and succeeded him as president in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 指执政党与在野党之间和平地转换执政权力。2000年陈水扁当选总统，实现了中华民国首次的政党轮替。
description.en: Refers to the peaceful transfer of executive power between the ruling party and the opposition party. Chen Shui-bian's election as president in 2000 marked the first party alternation in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁在2000年总统就职演说中提出的两岸关系主张，旨在缓和中国大陆对其的疑虑。
description.en: A cross-strait policy proposed by Chen Shui-bian in his 2000 inaugural address, aimed at easing concerns from mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 2004年总统大选前一天，候选人陈水扁与吕秀莲在台南市扫街时发生的枪击事件，事件对选举结果造成争议性影响。
description.en: A shooting incident that occurred on the eve of the 2004 presidential election, targeting candidates Chen Shui-bian and Annette Lu during a campaign rally in Tainan. The event controversially impacted the election results.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，于陈水扁总统任内担任副总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as Vice President during Chen Shui-bian's presidency.

description.zh-cn: 一项政治主张，认为台湾与中国是两个主权独立的国家。陈水扁在总统任内积极推动此概念。
description.en: A political concept asserting that Taiwan and China are two separate sovereign states. Chen Shui-bian actively promoted this idea during his presidency.

description.zh-cn: 一件涉及陈水扁在总统任内，被控收受贿赂协助特定企业收购土地并纳入科学园区的贪污案件，为此案陈水扁遭判刑定谳。
description.en: A corruption case in which Chen Shui-bian, during his presidency, was accused of accepting bribes to help a specific company acquire land and have it included in a science park. Chen was convicted and sentenced for this case.

nodes.id: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

zh-cn: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动
en: Million Voices Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go

description.zh-cn: 由前民进党主席施明德发起的政治运动，诉求总统陈水扁因弊案下台。
description.en: A political movement initiated by former DPP chairman Shih Ming-teh, demanding President Chen Shui-bian's resignation over corruption scandals.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任民主进步党主席。于2006年发起百万人民反贪倒扁运动。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party. He initiated the 'Million Voices Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go' movement in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政党，于2019年成立。陈水扁曾被该党列为不分区立委候选人，但遭中选会取消资格。该党在2020年选举失利后解散。
description.en: A Taiwanese political party founded in 2019. Chen Shui-bian was listed as its non-constituency legislative candidate but was disqualified by the Central Election Commission. The party dissolved after failing in the 2020 election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾党外运动的代表人物。他的政见演说启发了陈水扁弃商从法，他也是美丽岛事件的主要被告之一，后支持陈水扁参选总统。
description.en: A representative figure of the Tangwai movement in Taiwan. His political speeches inspired Chen Shui-bian to switch from business to law. He was one of the main defendants in the Kaohsiung Incident and later supported Chen's presidential campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1985年驾驶拼装车撞伤吴淑珍，导致其下半身瘫痪的肇事者。
description.en: The driver of the vehicle that struck and injured Wu Shu-chen in 1985, causing her lower-body paralysis.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国空军一级上将，陈水扁总统任内首位行政院院长，后因核四存废争议辞职。
description.en: A General of the Air Force, ROCAF, who served as the first Premier under President Chen Shui-bian. He later resigned over disputes concerning the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant.

nodes.id: 中央选举委员会 (中华民国)

zh-cn: 中央选举委员会 (中华民国)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主管选举、罢免、公民投票事务的独立机关。该委员会于2019年认定陈水扁不具备参选立法委员的资格。
description.en: The independent government agency responsible for managing elections, recalls, and referendums in the Republic of China. In 2019, the commission ruled that Chen Shui-bian was ineligible to run for legislator.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省曾经存在的县，现已与台南市合并为新的直辖市。陈水扁的出生地。
description.en: A former county in Taiwan Province, ROC, now merged with Tainan City to form a special municipality. It is the birthplace of Chen Shui-bian.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物及医师，曾任台北市长。在陈水扁健康问题上曾公开发表意见，并曾表示陈水扁一开始是装病。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician who served as the Mayor of Taipei. He publicly commented on Chen Shui-bian's health issues and once stated that Chen was initially feigning illness.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁在美丽岛事件中担任辩护律师团成员，成为其投身政坛的契机。
description.en: Chen Shui-bian served as a member of the defense counsel during the Kaohsiung Incident, which served as the catalyst for his entry into politics.

description.zh-cn: 黄信介的政见演说启发了当时就读商学系的陈水扁，使其决定休学重考并转读法律系。
description.en: A political speech by Huang Hsin-chieh inspired Chen Shui-bian, then a business student, to drop out, retake the university entrance exam, and switch to studying law.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁为民主进步党创始党员之一，曾因弊案自行退党，后又重新入党。
description.en: Chen Shui-bian was a founding member of the DPP. He voluntarily withdrew from the party due to corruption scandals and later rejoined.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁在2000年中华民国总统选举中获胜，实现了中华民国首次政党轮替。
description.en: Chen Shui-bian's victory in the 2000 ROC presidential election resulted in the first party alternation in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在1998年台北市市长选举中，马英九击败寻求连任的陈水扁。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou defeated Chen Shui-bian, who was seeking re-election, in the 1998 Taipei mayoral election.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁先后在台北市长、中华民国总统职位上，由马英九接任。
description.en: Chen Shui-bian was succeeded by Ma Ying-jeou as both Mayor of Taipei and President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁接替李登辉成为中华民国总统。
description.en: Chen Shui-bian succeeded Lee Teng-hui as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1998年陈水扁台北市长选举落败后，时任总统李登辉公开推荐《从摩西到约书亚》的文章给陈水扁，引发舆论对陈水扁可能成为其接班人的讨论。
description.en: After Chen Shui-bian lost the 1998 Taipei mayoral election, then-President Lee Teng-hui publicly recommended an article, 'From Moses to Joshua,' to him, sparking public discussion that Chen might be his successor.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁在其总统就职演说中提出“四不一没有”的两岸政策主张。
description.en: Chen Shui-bian proposed the 'Four Noes and One Without' cross-strait policy in his presidential inaugural address.

description.zh-cn: 该枪击案被认为影响了2004年总统大选的选情，助其以微弱优势连任。
description.en: The shooting incident is believed to have influenced the outcome of the 2004 presidential election, helping him win re-election by a narrow margin.

description.zh-cn: 在三一九枪击案中，吕秀莲的膝盖受到枪击受伤。
description.en: In the 319 shooting incident, Annette Lu was shot in the knee.

description.zh-cn: 在总统任内，陈水扁提出并推动“一边一国”的政治主张。
description.en: During his presidency, Chen Shui-bian proposed and promoted the political concept of 'One Country on Each Side'.

description.zh-cn: 因龙潭购地案，陈水扁被判刑入狱。
description.en: Chen Shui-bian was convicted and imprisoned for his involvement in the Longtan land deal case.

relationships.source: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 该运动诉求陈水扁为弊案负责并下台，对其声望和政治地位造成严重打击。
description.en: This movement demanded that Chen Shui-bian take responsibility for corruption scandals and step down, severely damaging his reputation and political standing.

relationships.target: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 施明德发起百万人民反贪倒扁运动。
description.en: Shih Ming-teh initiated the 'Million Voices Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go' movement.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，在陈水扁竞选台南县长败选的次日，张荣财驾驶的拼装车撞伤陪同谢票的吴淑珍，导致其下半身永久瘫痪。
description.en: In 1985, the day after Chen Shui-bian lost the Tainan County magistrate election, a vehicle driven by Chang Jung-tsai struck Wu Shu-chen, who was accompanying her husband to thank voters, causing permanent paralysis of her lower body.

description.zh-cn: 唐飞是陈水扁总统任内首位行政院院长，但因在核四续建问题上与陈水扁政府意见不合而辞职。
description.en: Tang Fei was the first Premier under President Chen Shui-bian, but he resigned due to disagreements with the Chen administration over the continuation of the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant project.

relationships.source: 中央选举委员会 (中华民国)

description.zh-cn: 中选会依据《选罢法》认定陈水扁不符合参选2020年立法委员的资格，因其曾犯贪污罪且刑期未执行完毕。
description.en: The Central Election Commission disqualified Chen Shui-bian from running for legislator in 2020 under the 'Civil Servants Election and Recall Act', due to his prior conviction for corruption and uncompleted sentence.

description.zh-cn: 因其支持的一边一国行动党在2020年立法委员选举中政党票失利，陈水扁宣布退出政坛。
description.en: After the Taiwan Action Party Alliance, which he supported, failed to win enough party-list votes in the 2020 legislative election, Chen Shui-bian announced his withdrawal from politics.

description.zh-cn: 时任台北市长柯文哲在电视专访中表示，他认为陈水扁“一开始是装的，后来就变成真的病了”，此番言论引发争议。
description.en: Then-Taipei Mayor Ko Wen-je stated in a TV interview that he believed Chen Shui-bian was 'initially feigning illness, but later it became a real illness,' a comment that sparked controversy.
